property.name: createMetadataEntityQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.metadata_entity ( entity_id, class_id, parent_id, entity_name, external_id, data) VALUES ( :ENTITY_ID, :CLASS_ID, :PARENT_ID, :ENTITY_NAME, :EXTERNAL_ID, to_jsonb(:DATA::jsonb))

property.name: updateMetadataEntityQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.metadata_entity SET entity_id = :ENTITY_ID, class_id = :CLASS_ID, parent_id = :PARENT_ID, entity_name = :ENTITY_NAME, external_id = :EXTERNAL_ID, data = to_jsonb(:DATA::jsonb) WHERE entity_id = :ENTITY_ID

property.name: updateMetadataEntityDataKeyQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.metadata_entity SET data = jsonb_set(data, @KEY@, @VALUE@, true) WHERE entity_id = :ENTITY_ID

property.name: loadAllMetadataEntitiesQuery
property.value: SELECT e.entity_id, e.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, e.data, c.external_class_name FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e INNER JOIN pipeline.metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id ORDER BY e.entity_id

property.name: loadMetadataEntityByIdQuery
property.value: SELECT e.entity_id, e.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, e.data, c.external_class_name FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e INNER JOIN pipeline.metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE e.entity_id = ? ORDER BY e.entity_id

property.name: insertCopiesOfExistentMetadataEntitiesQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.metadata_entity ( entity_id, class_id, parent_id, entity_name, external_id, data ) SELECT NEXTVAL('pipeline.s_metadata_entity') AS entity_id, class_id, ? AS parent_id, entity_name, external_id, data FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e WHERE e.parent_id = ?

property.name: loadRootMetadataEntityQuery
property.value: SELECT e.entity_id, c.class_name, e.data, null as parent_id, null as class_id, null as entity_name, null as external_id, c.external_class_name FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e INNER JOIN pipeline.metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE e.parent_id ISNULL

property.name: loadMetadataEntityByClassNameAndFolderIdQuery
property.value: SELECT e.entity_id, e.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, e.data, c.external_class_name FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e INNER JOIN pipeline.metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE e.parent_id = ? AND c.class_name = ? ORDER BY e.entity_id

property.name: deleteMetadataEntityDataKeyQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.metadata_entity SET data = data - @KEY@ WHERE entity_id = ?

property.name: deleteMetadataEntityItemQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.metadata_entity WHERE entity_id = ?

property.name: deleteMetadataInFolderQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.metadata_entity WHERE parent_id = ?

property.name: deleteMetadataEntitiesQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.metadata_entity WHERE entity_id IN (:ENTITIES_IDS)

property.name: deleteMetadataClassInProjectQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e WHERE e.parent_id = :PARENT_ID AND e.class_id = :CLASS_ID;

property.name: recursiveFilterQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE children AS ( SELECT p.folder_id, p.parent_id, p.folder_name, p.created_date, p.owner FROM folder p WHERE folder_id = :PARENT_ID UNION SELECT f.folder_id, f.parent_id, f.folder_name, f.created_date, f.owner FROM pipeline.folder f INNER JOIN children c ON c.folder_id = f.parent_id ) SELECT e.entity_id, c.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, e.data, c.external_class_name FROM children f LEFT JOIN metadata_entity e ON f.folder_id = e.parent_id INNER JOIN metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE class_name = :CLASS_NAME @WHERE_CLAUSE@ @ORDER_CLAUSE@ LIMIT :LIMIT OFFSET :OFFSET;

property.name: baseFilterQuery
property.value: SELECT e.entity_id, c.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, e.data, c.external_class_name FROM metadata_entity e INNER JOIN metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE class_name = :CLASS_NAME AND parent_id = :PARENT_ID @WHERE_CLAUSE@ @ORDER_CLAUSE@ LIMIT :LIMIT OFFSET :OFFSET;

property.name: recursiveFilterCountQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE children AS ( SELECT p.folder_id, p.parent_id, p.folder_name, p.created_date, p.owner FROM folder p WHERE folder_id = :PARENT_ID UNION SELECT f.folder_id, f.parent_id, f.folder_name, f.created_date, f.owner FROM pipeline.folder f INNER JOIN children c ON c.folder_id = f.parent_id ) SELECT count(*) as count FROM children f LEFT JOIN metadata_entity e ON f.folder_id = e.parent_id INNER JOIN metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE class_name = :CLASS_NAME @WHERE_CLAUSE@;

property.name: baseFilterCountQuery
property.value: SELECT count(*) as count FROM metadata_entity e INNER JOIN metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE class_name = :CLASS_NAME AND parent_id = :PARENT_ID @WHERE_CLAUSE@;

property.name: externalIdClauseQuery
property.value: LOWER(e.external_id) LIKE '%@QUERY@%'

property.name: searchClauseQuery
property.value: EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM jsonb_each(e.data) AS e(key, value) WHERE LOWER(e.value ->> 'value') LIKE '%@QUERY@%' )

property.name: loadMetadataKeysQuery
property.value: SELECT DISTINCT jsonb_object_keys(data) as key FROM metadata_entity WHERE parent_id = ? AND class_id = ?

property.name: loadMetadataKeysRecursiveQuery
property.value: SELECT m.class_id, m.class_name, m.entity_id, m.key, m.data->m.key->>'type' as type, m.external_class_name FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE children AS ( SELECT p.folder_id, p.parent_id, p.folder_name, p.created_date, p.owner FROM folder p WHERE folder_id = :PARENT_ID UNION SELECT f.folder_id, f.parent_id, f.folder_name, f.created_date, f.owner FROM pipeline.folder f INNER JOIN children c ON c.folder_id = f.parent_id ) SELECT DISTINCT ON (c.class_id, class_name, key) c.class_id, c.class_name, m.entity_id, jsonb_object_keys(m.data) as key, m.data, c.external_class_name FROM metadata_entity m INNER JOIN children ON children.folder_id = m.parent_id LEFT JOIN metadata_entity_class c on c.class_id = m.class_id ) AS m ;

property.name: loadEntitiesInProjectQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE folders AS ( SELECT p.folder_id, p.parent_id, p.folder_name, p.created_date, p.owner FROM folder p WHERE folder_id = :PARENT_ID UNION SELECT f.folder_id, f.parent_id, f.folder_name, f.created_date, f.owner FROM pipeline.folder f INNER JOIN folders c ON c.folder_id = f.parent_id ) SELECT e.entity_id, e.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, NULL as data, c.c.external_class_name FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e INNER JOIN folders ON folders.folder_id = e.parent_id INNER JOIN metadata_entity_class c on c.class_id = e.class_id WHERE c.class_name = :CLASS_NAME;

property.name: loadByExternalIdsQuery
property.value: SELECT e.entity_id, e.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, e.data, c.external_class_name FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e INNER JOIN pipeline.metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE e.parent_id = ? AND c.class_name = ? AND e.external_id = ANY(values %s) ORDER BY e.entity_id

property.name: loadBylIdsQuery
property.value: SELECT e.entity_id, e.class_id, c.class_name, e.parent_id, e.entity_name, e.external_id, e.data, c.external_class_name FROM pipeline.metadata_entity e INNER JOIN pipeline.metadata_entity_class c ON e.class_id = c.class_id WHERE e.entity_id = ANY(values %s) ORDER BY e.entity_id

property.name: loadAllReferencesQuery
loadMetadataEntityWithParentsQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE children AS ( SELECT p.entity_id, p.entity_name::VARCHAR(100), p.external_id, p.class_id, p.parent_id, p.data, f.folder_id AS folder_id, f.parent_id AS parent_folder_id FROM pipeline.metadata_entity p LEFT JOIN pipeline.folder f ON p.parent_id = f.folder_id WHERE p.entity_id = ? UNION SELECT null AS entity_id, null::VARCHAR(100) AS entity_name, null AS external_id, null AS class_id, null AS parent_id, null AS data, m.folder_id AS folder_id, m.parent_id AS parent_folder_id FROM pipeline.folder m INNER JOIN children t ON t.parent_folder_id = m.folder_id ) SELECT * FROM children;
